context: Hello Whats a good kid movie?
Despicable Me (2010) is a good one, my little one loves it.
My son loves that movie He want to see Peter Rabbit (2018) have you seen that one
about what age are you looking for? I have not seen Peter Rabbit (2018) I will have to add that one to my must watch list.
I'm sure he will like Hotel Transylvania (2012) or The Incredibles (2004)
The new Incredibles 2 (2018) Yea lol he saw the first one.
resp: Also, Bolt (2008) is another good one.
